EDITED: retrying Trajectories (v2.2.0 for KSP 1.4.2)...

 

Hi,

Is existing a good mod (for 1.4) in order to do a precise re-entry & landing on Kerbin? (for pods/spacecrafts).

Thanks in advance for recommendations.

Edited April 17, 2018 by DomiKamu

Not sure if that's what you want, but I use the mod "Trajectories" for this.  It paints a big red X on the predicted landing spot. Burn fuel to move that X as close to the KSC as possible, then glide my plane straight to the runway.  Works for uncontrolled pods too, of course, but no way to correct the trajectory later.

Thanks Atlessa, of course I've re-tried "Trajectories" v2.2.0 for KSP 1.4.2, the main problem big red X always moves, in particular after lastest maneuver just prior Kerbin reentry, and BTW, my pod is splashing/landing elsewhere else as expected (too far). Looking for YT tutorials (if exist), surely they can help me to "master" (to understand) this mod. Thanks anyway for your reply, appreciated!
